about_the_game:
This game is a simple and highly challenging 2D puzzle game with a system similar to "Sokoban," in which the player moves boxes to secure a path to the goal.

As you progress, gimmicks are added, such as "unlocking a passageway with a key," "shooting arrows to destroy balloon objects," "disappearing blocks that disappear once you get on them," "transfer gates connecting two points," "elevating blocks that switch with arrows," and "interlocking tags that move another box together when you move a box. Gimmicks are added to the game.

If you get stuck, you can share the stage codes set for each stage with your friends, allowing each of you to play the same stage regardless of your progress.

This game is a fan game for the archer 🏹 Ieiri Popo of the Vtuber unit "HIYOCRO".

BGM is provided by "DOVA-SYNDROME", a music material site.
Sound effect creation software "sfxr" is used.

[About the distribution of gameplay videos]
No report is required when distributing gameplay videos.
Please note that we are not responsible for any damage caused by the actual game play and distribution.

This game is a simple and highly challenging 2D puzzle game with a system similar to "Sokoban," in which the player moves boxes to secure a path to the goal.

As you progress, gimmicks are added, such as "unlocking a passageway with a key," "shooting arrows to destroy balloon objects," "disappearing blocks that disappear once you get on them," "transfer gates connecting two points," "elevating blocks that switch with arrows," and "interlocking tags that move another box together when you move a box. Gimmicks are added to the game.

If you get stuck, you can share the stage codes set for each stage with your friends, allowing each of you to play the same stage regardless of your progress.

This game is a fan game for the archer 🏹 Ieiri Popo of the Vtuber unit "HIYOCRO".

name: Pushing POPO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7 ,8 ,10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.0GHz or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: This game is a simple and highly challenging 2D puzzle game for those who like to think but are too lazy to remember. By sharing stage codes, players can play the same stage even if they have just downloaded the game. Move the boxes in the stage and reach the goal to clear the stage.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Japanese, French, German, Turkish
